definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
forehead/horizontal tablet or inscribed board/specified number or amount

sentences.english: Gradually push forward the controls over the total amount and quota management of agricultural water consumption.
sentences.chinese: 逐步推行农业用水总量控制与定额管理。

sentences.english: Now the workout method of pretender is a norm and practical method.
sentences.chinese: 目前，标底编制主要采用定额法和实物量法。

sentences.english: Every project quantity applies to the corresponding quota of 《Unifying The Form of Basic Price in Hubei Province》.
sentences.chinese: 各项工程量套用《湖北省统一基价表》相应的定额。

sentences.english: Irrigating water quota has a remarkable effect on leaf area and plant height.
sentences.chinese: 灌水定额对夏玉米叶面积和株高有显著影响。

sentences.english: Trials to set the allowable number of employees, level of funding and limits for spending for goods within basic expenditures expanded.
sentences.chinese: 扩大基本支出定员定额和实物费用定额试点。

sentences.english: Trials to set the allowable number of employees, level of funding and limits for spending for goods within basic expenditures expanded.
sentences.chinese: 扩大基本支出定员定额和实物费用定额试点。

sentences.english: The co-payment is usually about five to ten dollars per hospital visit.
sentences.chinese: 每次就医的定额手续费通常是五到十美元。

sentences.english: To improve work efficiency, bagged soil nutrient management should be fixed.
sentences.chinese: 为提高工作效率，营养袋装土应采用定额管理。

sentences.english: The article introduces the process that the company of Building Boiler manage welding material ration by computer software.
sentences.chinese: 锅炉生产厂的焊材定额微机化管理的实现过程。

sentences.english: His mother had said it reminded her of wartime rationing."Which
sentences.chinese: 她妈妈曾说，这路让她想起了战时的定额配给。

sentences.english: With the increase of irrigation amount, the lengths of fibers have a tendency to increase.
sentences.chinese: 不同灌溉方式和灌水定额对棉花衣分影响很小。

sentences.english: The paper researches the effect of irrigation technology parameters on irrigating water quota.
sentences.chinese: 研究了灌水技术要素对膜孔灌灌水定额的影响。

sentences.english: No re-rating is required with changes in policy details.
sentences.chinese: 如果保单细节发生便化，无需再次定额。

sentences.english: All the factories in our city have fulfilled their production quota ahead of time.
sentences.chinese: 本市所有的工厂都已经提前完成了生产定额。

sentences.english: In fulfilling the production quotas, John made rings round all his fellow workers.
sentences.chinese: 约翰完成生产定额大大超过他的同事们。

sentences.english: All policies received by Hollard from Barclay Card, will not be subjected to a re-rating process.
sentences.chinese: 所有通过巴克莱银行接受的保单无需进行再次定额。

definition: to be reimbursed for actual expenses
(after a sum has been paid in advance) to refund (in case of overpayment) or be reimbursed (in case of underpayment)
to audit and determine/to check and ratify/to appraise and decide/determination/on a deemed basis (taxation)/to deem
